name: CRAVE (itch) (akirassasin, Keffk5)
description:
Controls: 

  • Cursor to aim
  • WASD or Arrow keys: Move
  • Left-click: Attack
  • Right-click: Special ability (some abilities require you to hold it down to work~!)
  • Space: eat a nearby creature you are aiming at (creature health must be red)

Goal: Survive for as long as possible. Your hunger eats at you every 10 seconds. Can you take out the creatures of the void and consume their powers for your own? Share your best times in the comments!

Description: You are haunted by the need to eat, and hunted by a Wraith of the Void. Explore a world filled with strange and wonderful creatures, and decide which will make for the best snack to suit your current needs! But be warned, for you are what you eat! 

Quite literally, you take on the abilities of the most recent creature consumed!
